attributes.action: To look to improve the laws regarding travellers and illegal campments
attributes.additional_details: Travellers cost us tax payers and councils are having to waste valuable resources. We need more protections against illegal campments
attributes.background:
To change laws, increase powers and deny rights to travellers, who set up illegal camps, trespass and cost tax payers millions.

Travellers have more rights than local residents and it isn't fair or right.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what changes to the law you'd like to see. Illegal encampments are already illegal. 

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you do start a new petition, you'll need to include your surname.
